short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create SmartPlaylists, tag, track and organize your music and subscription services with metadata you control.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JamList Muic Database gives you control over your music library and metadata, allowing you to modify it yourself and to build powerful customized Smart Playlists using that metadata.
